alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Schuyler (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Schuyler and central Chemung Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 300 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Big Flats, or near West Elmira, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elmira, Southport, Big Flats, Horseheads, Elmira Heights, Erin, Cayuta, Millport, West Elmira and Breesport. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 49 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central New York.
